Package ClientSide.GUI

Class AdminFunctions

java.lang.Object
ClientSide.GUI.AdminFunctions
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
public class AdminFunctions
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
The Admin Home functions grouped in this class for simplicity and to keep other admin classes single-purpose only. These functions are for the control panels that admins will use to control database objects. Each of these functions will check a user's admin access in-case their privileges are revoked mid-session by another admin user... as we'd want them to stop using these abilities ASAP!
Author:
Johnny Madigan

    • AdminFunctions

      public AdminFunctions​(User user, javax.swing.JFrame frame, NetworkConnection data, AdminRefresh refresher)
      Constructor that activates the action listeners for reset buttons
      Parameters:
      user - the currently logged-in user for the session
      frame - the main Java Swing frame
      data - the network data interface methods to carry over
      refresher - the table refresher instance
